SELECT a.id, a.eventId, a.serial, a.warningVideoName, a.warningVideoPath, a.warningTime, a.fileType, a.warningPictureLittle, a.warningPictureBig, a.description, a.liveStreaming, a.createTime, a.isValid, CONCAT(CAST(date_format(ifnull(b.mesDate,b.createTime), '%Y年%m月%d日%h时%m分%s秒') AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) ,CAST(ifnull(b.groupName,'') AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) ,CAST(ifnull(b.deviceName,'') AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) ,'发现目标，并成功告警。') as warningMessage FROM deviceVideo a LEFT JOIN warningMessage b ON a.eventId=b.eventId WHERE a.serial = #{serial}
LIMIT ${(pageNo-1)*pageSize},${pageSize};
